title: Get SESSION RESULT-belongs-to-racing-session Relationship
description:
* The ›belongs-to-racing-session‹ relationship for the selected SESSION RESULT is returned when one exists. -> Status Code \`200\`
* The response contains the relationship ID, the relationship name and the relationship partner.
* An empty response is returned when the selected SESSION RESULT has no ›belongs-to-racing-session‹ relationship. -> Status Code \`200\`
* Requests with invalid ID are rejected. This can happen when there exists no node with the given ID or it is not a SESSION RESULT. -> Status Code \`404\`
